institutions.name: Honebi
responsibilities: Built REST APIs using microservice architecture to enable seamless communication between the front-end and back-end components.
Developed an import-export module by which we can  create or update data using an Excel sheet.
Handled the backend of an internal project called Pagebuilder in which we can control the various page components from the super admin dashboard.
Build a feature where a CronJob will remove all the corrupted product variant images from the catalogue
